articles.author: Aika Rey
articles.title: AirAsia to cover COVID-19 vaccination of over 1,500 employees - Rappler
articles.description: Employees of AirAsia Philippines will start getting vaccinated in May
articles.content: Vaccination will start in May, the airline said, identifying priority employees such as ground staff, pilots, cabin crew, and other workers with direct engagement with guests.
